import React, { useState } from 'react' export const Signup = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', emailAddress: '', mobileNumber: '', password: '', state: '', city: '', course: '' }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUser((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })); }; const [formError, setFormError] = ({}); const validateForm = () => { } return (
